subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Any insight on my life changing EVP experience?
author: don powell
full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

I thought we all decided to drop this line of discussion.





________________________________
From: black bear hollow <blackbearhollow@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, December 4, 2008 5:35:25 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Any insight on my life changing EVP experience?


I guess I could say the same about you. 

Not sure what your intent is other than to attack, which 
isn't worth the effort of a reply. Crawl back to your own list 
if you want to fight and add negativity Steve. It isn't 
welcome here.


On Dec 4, 2008, at 6:30 PM, Steve Hultay wrote:

Seems like your an expert on every topic here, no matter what it is. 
Now i have a place to go and hash out my problems for you to help 
with. Did you know, nobody does any ITC research on here at all. 
Just people stating facts about a field that has no answers, actually 
by a person who attacked me for saying i was an expert.

Practice what you preach,
-Steve
